disclaimer.title: Important Budget Note
disclaimer.text: This figure is a 'starting from' reference price. To give you an exact quote without commitment, we need to perform a free technical appraisal at your property. We want to give you the best real price.

large_scale.title: Large Scale Project
large_scale.text: For properties of this size, a chart doesn't do justice to the precision you deserve. We prefer to study your case personally to offer an optimized and professional proposal.

painting_note.title: About the Painting Service
painting_note.text: This price of 5€/m² applies to smooth walls and light colors. If the surface has defects, needs prior treatment, or dark colors, we will provide a free personalized valuation.

pillar_management.title: Property Management & Care
pillar_management.subtitle: We take care of your home when you are away. Peace of mind 24/7.

pillar_construction.title: Construction & Design
pillar_construction.subtitle: We build and renovate your dream home in Spain.

management.title: Total Property Care
management.description: Premium care for absent owners. Regular inspections, key holding, and storm checks. We are your trusted eyes in Spain.
management.vision: Own a home in Spain without the stress. Our complete management service ensures your property is always perfect, secure, and ready for your arrival, so you don't have to worry about a thing.

steps.title: On-Site Setup
steps.desc: Key handover and first initial inspection of the whole property.

steps.title: Regular Checks
steps.desc: Weekly or bi-weekly visits to check water, lights, security, and ventilation.

steps.title: Transparent Reporting
steps.desc: Real-time updates and photos after every visit via your preferred channel.

steps.title: Rapid Response
steps.desc: Immediate action after storms or if any issue is detected during checks.

maintenance.title: Preventive Maintenance
maintenance.description: Proactive solutions to avoid costly repairs. We handle plumbing, electrical, and general fixes with absolute reliability.

new_build.title: New Build Villas
new_build.description: Your dream villa from scratch. We handle licenses, architects, and construction. Turnkey delivery.

renovation.title: Full Renovations
renovation.description: Transform your property completely. New layout, modern style, and higher value. On time and on budget.

kitchen.title: Kitchens & Baths
kitchen.description: Modern kitchens and luxury bathrooms. The most important rooms in your house, upgraded.

pool.title: Pools & Exterior
pool.description: Enjoy the Spanish sun. Pools, terraces, and gardens designed for relaxation and low maintenance.

step1.title: Contact Us
step1.desc: Tell us what you need. English spoken.

step2.title: Punctuality & Trust
step2.desc: We value your time. We arrive exactly on time for every single appointment.

step4.title: Execution
step4.desc: We do the work. You get updates.

About.title: The Perfect Mix: Nerja + Holland
About.subtitle: Local Tradition and Spanish-Dutch Quality.
About.story: J&D Elite Builders was born from the union of two cultures. We are two young entrepreneurs, one native to Nerja and the other from Holland, who decided to join forces. We combine deep knowledge of the Costa del Sol terrain and local regulations with the methodology and precision that defines us. We are methodical and passionate about offering professional work, meticulously taking care of every technical and aesthetic detail.
About.satisfaction: Our greatest reward is knowing that there is nothing like leaving the client fully satisfied with their new home.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio of Excellence
Portfolio.subtitle: A selection of our most outstanding projects, where Dutch precision meets local passion.

ServicePage.promo_msg: Ask for our rates without commitment and benefit from competitive pricing where you won't have to worry about a thing.
ServicePage.why_trust_text: Founded by a local professional from Nerja and an expert from Holland, our company combines Mediterranean passion with Northern European discipline and precision. We don't just build houses, we create homes with international standards.

Footer.description: Leading construction company in Nerja and Costa del Sol. Specialists in full renovations, new builds, and maintenance with Spanish-Dutch quality.
